links.title: Tesla Model 3 Critic Flips View, Sees Sedan Being Profitable
links.description: The rollout of Tesla Inc.'s Model 3 electric sedan over the last year was plagued by delays and doubts over whether it could ever be profitable. Now, one of car's most outspoken early critics has changed his view.
